titleStmt.title: A panegyrick on His Excellency the Lord General George Monck, commander in chief of all the forces in England, Scotland, and Ireland
titleStmt.author: Denham, John, Sir, 1615-1669.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Sir John Denham. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
